subject: Re: [junit] How can i test a geter or seter?
msgSnippet: ... Exactly the philosophy of eXtreme Programming where JUnit probably has its roots. Instead of predicting what the function will do in the future, it s
messageBody:
> -----------------------------------------
> Keep it simple...
> (1 Corinthians 2:2, Galatians 2:20, 6:14)

Exactly the philosophy of eXtreme Programming where JUnit probably has its roots.
Instead of predicting what the function will do in the future, it's preferable to
work
with the present, and not have a test for it. If and when it changes to a more
complex
implementation, by all means, add a test.
regards,
Nilesh
